chartSettings.plainMarkdownContent:
|  |  |
| - | - |
| ![vSphere](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/wavefront-img/vsphere.jpg) | **vSphere Cluster**: This dashboard provides real-time visibility into the overview of a Cluster.

sources.name: Query
sources.query: sum(align(1m, ts("vsphere.host.cpu.usagemhz.average", vcenter="${a_vcenter}" and dcname="${b_dc}" and clustername="${c_cluster}")))

sources.name: Query
sources.query: count(align(1m, ts("vsphere.host.cpu.costop.summation", vcenter="${a_vcenter}" and dcname="${b_dc}" and clustername="${c_cluster}")))

sources.name: Query
sources.query: count(align(1m, ts("vsphere.vm.cpu.demand.average", vcenter="${a_vcenter}" and dcname="${b_dc}" and clustername="${c_cluster}")))

sources.name: Query
sources.query: sum(align(1m, ts("vsphere.host.mem.totalCapacity.average", vcenter="${a_vcenter}" and dcname="${b_dc}" and clustername="${c_cluster}")))

sources.name: Query
sources.query: avg(ts("vsphere.host.mem.usage.average", vcenter="${a_vcenter}" and dcname="${b_dc}" and clustername="${c_cluster}"))

sources.name: used
sources.query: last(30h, sum(align(30m, ts("vsphere.datastore.disk.used.latest", vcenter="${a_vcenter}" and dcname="${b_dc}"))))

sources.name: New Query
sources.query: topk(10, ts("vsphere.host.cpu.usagemhz.average", vcenter="${a_vcenter}" and dcname="${b_dc}" and clustername="${c_cluster}"))

sources.name: New Query
sources.query: topk(10, ts("vsphere.host.mem.usage.average", vcenter="${a_vcenter}" and dcname="${b_dc}" and clustername="${c_cluster}"))

charts.name: Create / Destroy - 1 hour

sources.name: base
sources.query: ts("vsphere.cluster.vmop.numClone.latest" or "vsphere.cluster.vmop.numCreate.latest" or "vsphere.cluster.vmop.numDeploy.latest" or "vsphere.cluster.vmop.numDestroy.latest", vcenter="${a_vcenter}" and dcname="${b_dc}")

charts.description: Virtual Machine, create, clone, deploy, and destroy operations

charts.name: vMotion - 1 hour
charts.description: Storage and Virtual Machine migration operations

charts.name: Registration - 1 hour
charts.description: Virtual Machine register and unregister operations

charts.name: Power - 1 hour

sources.name: base
sources.query: ts("vsphere.cluster.vmop.numPoweroff.latest" or "vsphere.cluster.vmop.numPoweron.latest" or "vsphere.cluster.vmop.numReset.latest" or "vsphere.cluster.vmop.numSuspend.latest", vcenter="${a_vcenter}" and dcname="${b_dc}")

charts.description: Virtual Machine power, reset and suspend operations

charts.name: Guest Power - 1 hour
charts.description: Guest reboot, shutdown, and standby operations

chartSettings.plainMarkdownContent: **Note:** *This dashboard is provided by Wavefront. It's not directly editable, which lets us deploy new versions without affecting any of your customizations. If you want to make your own version, click ![pencil](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/wavefront-img/pen-icon.png) **> Clone** and give the dashboard a new URL*.
